content: Hello everyone!I don't know if I am the only one who experienced this today, but I just noticed that my user stats were disabled for show stats and show posts (except for show threads which still works fine for me). While I am trying to check the profiles of others and their stats, they're seem to be fine. Is there something wrong in my part on why my user stats were disabled? I can't keep track of posts that I have contributed from the past until now.Can anyone please enlighten me on this issue please? Thanks in advance.

comments.body: User stats are disbled for every member:Quote from: DdmrDdmr on April 08, 2020, 10:27:40 AMBecause they are disabled for everybody. comments.body: Just noticed it? Where have you've been in the past years without noticing it. It's been years already since its been disabled due to security and server loading reasons (I guess). There are lots of websites like ninjastic space and bpip that can show every user statistics, with much better look and more info is shown than the default forum users' statistics.
